objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver
Rose Gold Finish
Wrapped in Crystals
Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner showcases a luxurious and feminine design emphasizing rose gold jewelry. The layout uses a soft diagonal gradient split background merging pastel pink and ivory, adorned with delicate abstract star and swirl accents. A stylish serif typeface in the text layer **heading** presents the main title at the top. Just below, the **subheading** uses a decorative serif font in a bold rose tone to convey luxury. The **description** section follows with minimal spacing, summarizing the product details. The product image (**product_image**) of rose gold earrings is prominently positioned diagonally. The **tagline** and **subheading_2** enhance emotional appeal. The **price** is shown boldly, complemented by a red-toned rectangular call-to-action button (**cta_background**) with white text (**cta**) at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Rosé: #873e3e
- Blush Pink: #f0d4d4
- Coral Rose: #db7676
- Soft Ivory: #fff5e6
- Warm Beige: #fff9f0
- Accent Coral: #e7766e
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings crafted with a soft, feminine color palette. The primary color is a *rose gold* (#F5B6B3), which serves as the base metal and outlines the delicate floral elements. The accompanying stones are *crystal white* (#FFFFFF) and *diamond silver* (#D9D9D9), adding brilliance and contrast that highlight the rose gold structure. A soft *blush pink* (#FADADD) fills the pear-shaped enamel area, blending seamlessly into the rose gold contours. The overall color blending allows the earrings to appear radiant and luxurious without overpowering one another, making rose gold the hero color supported by soft, luminous details.
